      • deal

        public java.util.Collection<PolicyCard> deal(int count)
        Returns a collection of cards from the shuffled deck. If there are insufficient cards remaining, then the count is adjusted.
        Parameters:
        count - The number of cards requested.
        Returns:
        The cards drawn from the deck.

      • remaining

        Returns:
        The number of cards remaining in the shuffled deck.
